channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network Datatype Description This type contains the structure of network-related objects that may be specified when ordering services. Local network The [[SoftLayer_Network]] object. Type: SoftLayer_Network publicVlans The list of public [[SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Vlan|vlans]] available for ordering. Each VLAN will have list of public subnets that are accessible to the VLAN. Type: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order[] subnets The list of private [[SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Subnet|subnets]] available for ordering with a description of their available IP space.
